name: Chaotic Pursuit
description:
You're a blind marksman who uses his super senses to exterminate one-eyed creatures that pursue him.

You miss a shot and you're out!



Are you ready?

Main features:

  • 20 challenging levels.
  • Forest, Desert, Ice Land and Farm as arena maps.
  • Shooting and dashing skills only. You depend on your good aim!

And more secrets that you need to play to discover them!
